channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Realtek Audio Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Realtek Audio Driver

item.title: CVE-2017-3767|2024-09-17T01:27:06.643Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- realtek%20audio%20driver
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability was identified in the Realtek audio driver versions prior to 6.0.1.8224 in some Lenovo ThinkPad products. An attacker with local privileges could execute code with administrative privileges.
